nodes.text: Hadrassians's compound was a compound owned by the Amaxine warriors' leader Arliz Hadrassian in Daxam IV's Western Wastes. The compound was near an Amaxine warriors' camp on the planet which hosted at least a thousand warriors and fifty starfighters. Hadrassian lived on the compound and kept her brother's Emperor's Royal Guard helmet there. In 28 ABY, the New Republic senator Ransolm Casterfo visited the compound as part of his investigation into the Amaxine warriors.
